channel.title: silviu's blog
channel.description: A blog about programming and the pleasure of figuring things out. By Silviu Dan Cacoveanu.

item.title: Spark Streaming Read from Kafka Rest Proxy
item.description: How to read from a Kafka REST proxy into a Spark streaming job using a custom stream receiver, and how to parallelize this setup..

item.title: Exposing Kafka Service Through Port-Forwarding Proxy
item.description: How to build an architecture that connects a secured Kafka service and a Spark streaming application through a port-forwarding proxy in a Docker cluster.

item.title: Spark Job File Configuration
item.description: How to simplify the deployment of your Spark jobs with a configuration file.

item.title: Spark UI Authentication
item.description: Presenting two methods for building an authentication filter for Spark UI. And a little bonus at the end.

item.title: A Spark MLlib Test Setup
item.description: I am creating a short clustering test pipeline for GPS data, from loading the data from HDFS, through preparing the feature vectors and ending with the visualization of the data.

item.title: Going Static Tutorial
item.description: I walk you through the steps of setting up a static blog on GitHub.

item.title: Going Static
item.description: Where I give you a short history of my blogs and make the case that taking a simpler approach to running your site may be the better option in the long run.

item.title: Asymmetric JWT
item.description: Authentication service implemented with JWT token signed with asymmetric key.

item.title: Wakey Wakey, PC
item.description: For those lazy Sunday mornings, when getting our of bed to wake up your media server seems excessive, but your laptop is within reach and writing a small program to send a Wake-On-LAN signal sounds so reasonable; it is in recognition of those mornings that I've put together this instructional page.
